text: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes is 1972 American science fiction movie directed by J. Lee Thompson and is the fourth movie in the original Planet of the Apes series. It stars Roddy McDowall, Don Murray, Ricardo Montalban, Natalie Trundy, Hari Rhodes, Lou Wagner and Severn Darden and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1972 science fiction movies Category:Planet of the Apes movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by J. title: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
